_description: You find yourself in a clearing with tall grass surrounded by trees where the sound of chirping can be heard and a gentle breeze can be felt. At the center of the clearing is a giant tree with a hole in its trunk. To your side, there is a trail leading into the forest.
enterDescription: You find yourself in a clearing with tall grass surrounded by trees where the sound of chirping can be heard and a gentle breeze can be felt. At the center of the clearing is a giant tree with a hole in its trunk. To your side, there is a trail leading into the forest.
